sentence.Network_en: Malcolm works in isolation but I have no doubts about his abilities.

sentence.Network_en: I take care of them to the best of my abilities.
sentence.Network_cn: 我尽我所能地照顾他们。

sentence.Network_en: Does the school cater for all abilities?
sentence.Network_cn: 学校能够做到因材施教吗？

entry.tran: （替代-able加在形容词尾构成名词）表示“状态”，“性质”
entry.def: -ability replaces '-able' at the end of adjectives to form nouns. Nouns formed in this way refer to the state or quality described by the adjectives.

example.ex: No one ever questioned her capability.
example.tran: 从来没有人质疑她的能力。
